data.title: Asya Taste
data.text:
About Us

Established in 1972, ASYA Fruit Juice and Food Ind. Inc. opened its production facilities in Avanos, Nevşehir in 1975. In the year 1983, ASYA Fruit Juice and Food Ind. Inc. moved its production facilities located in Avanos to Boğazova in Eğirdir, Isparta, in the Lakes Region, which has the most exceptional and highest capacity in Turkey especially in terms of apple production, where it built the most up-to-date fruit juice concentrate and puree processing facility in Turkey.

The apple output of Boğazova alone is around 200,000 tons a year. With the periphery of 50-60 km, the output reaches 400.000 tons. Considering a periphery of 150 km, the output reaches 800,000 tons. In this regard, Eğirdir is the best site available in Turkey. The transport costs have been reduced to a level close to zero. Also, it is located at a distance of about 100 km to the sour cherry and pomegranate raw materials, which have recently acquired great commercial value.
